snippet: The Irish novelist John Banville will revive Raymond Chandler’s Los Angeles, under the pseudonym Benjamin Black.
abstract: Verlyn Klinkenborg Editorial Observer welcomes literary news that Irish novelist John Banville will write detective story with Philip Marlowe, a character originally created by Raymond Chandler, under the pseudonym Benjamin Black.
lead_paragraph: The Irish novelist John Banville will revive Raymond Chandler’s Los Angeles, under the pseudonym Benjamin Black.

headline.print_headline: Philip Marlowe, Peerless Detective, Returns for an Encore
headline.seo: Philip Marlowe, Peerless Detective, Returns for an Encore
headline.main: Philip Marlowe, Peerless Detective, Returns for an Encore
